Sipna College of Enginnering And Technology, Amravati

Event Name : Shuter Splash

Vision beyond the lens

Photography

Entry Fees:

  • 100/- per image (1 participant can only submit 2 photograph)

    • Prize:

  • Winner: 1100/- (Theme 1)
  • Winner: 1100/- (Theme 2)

    • Rules:

    • THEME:

      1. Photography depicting Culture

      2. Wildlife photography

    • One person can only submit only 2 Photographs
    • Watermarkas won't be allowed
    • Photo size munt be A4.

    Film Making

    Entry Fees:

  • 200/- per team (max 3 participants)

    • Prize:

  • Winner: 2500/-
  • Runner Up: 1500/-

    • Rules:

  • Already created/vulgar/controversial content will be disqualified.
  • Do not mention any names or symbols that would reveal participant's identity.
  • Resolution of video should be 720p, HD, full HD or 4K
  • Subtitles can be deployed (not compulsory).
  • Note: Participants should submit the photographs and short films till 5 Feb 2024
  • Film should not be more than 7 min.

    • Note:

  • Last date of submission : 2 February. Late submission won't be considered
  • Bring your college ID Cards and Receipt on event day
  • All the participants will be awarded with Participation Certificates"
